verbose_text: The products of four genes, MSH2, MSH6, MLH1 and PMS2, form a complex and play an important role in recognizing the mismatched bases to induce apoptosis, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and it is generally assumed that a defect in any one of these genes may lead to defects in mismatched base induced apoptosis.
evidence: MSH6, MLH1 and PMS2, form a complex
